name: Phase Tapes
description:
For in game screen reading, press the Zero key at any point in the game.

For subtitles, press the S key.

A man settles down in a quiet home in Marblehead, Massachusetts only to find a suitcase full of cassette tapes that may put a wrench in his plan for peaceful solitude.

Content Warnings:  Mildly Violent Dialogue

This game is an atmospheric mystery game, so please put on some headphones and settle in!

This game was made for Audio Game Jam 2020 by:

Tigran (@tigfuz_sound) - Sound Composition for noise on the cassette tapes, Writing and Game Design Ideation

Eamon Kane - Script Writing, Voice Acting, Game Design Ideation

Kurt Roembke (@spaceowlpro) - Coding, Game Design Implementation, Audio/Visual Implementation, Music Composition
